mapper.select: SELECT pmid, disease, gene, snp FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs`
SELECT pmid, disease, gene, snp FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs` where disease LIKE CONCAT('%',#{disease},'%') order by snp desc;
SELECT pmid, disease, gene, snp FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs` where gene LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gene},'%') order by snp desc;
SELECT pmid, disease, gene, snp FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs` where pmid LIKE '#{pmid}';

SELECT distinct pair.gene, pair.disease, dgi.interaction_types, dgi.drug_name FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs` as pair join test.`dgi_interactions` as dgi on(pair.gene = dgi.gene_name) where pair.disease LIKE CONCAT('%',#{disease},'%') and dgi.interaction_types != '' and dgi.drug_name != '';

SELECT distinct pair.gene, pair.disease, dgi.interaction_types, dgi.drug_name FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs` as pair join test.`dgi_interactions` as dgi on(pair.gene = dgi.gene_name) where pair.gene LIKE CONCAT('',#{gene},'') and dgi.interaction_types != '' and dgi.drug_name != '';

SELECT distinct pair.gene, pair.disease, dgi.interaction_types, dgi.drug_name FROM test.`disease-gene_pairs` as pair join test.`dgi_interactions` as dgi on(pair.gene = dgi.gene_name) where dgi.drug_name LIKE CONCAT('',#{drug},'') and dgi.interaction_types != '' and dgi.drug_name != '';
